questionTitle: The secretary thought that she <u><font color='red'>will</font></u> have to <u><font color='red'>wait</font></u> until tomorrow to send the letters because the mail had already <u><font color='red'>gone</font></u>, but her boss suggested that she <u><font color='red'>take</font></u> them to the post office instead.
